Define the first term of the sequence x_1 = 1/2.
Establish the recursive formula for subsequent terms where x_(k+1) = x_k^2 + x_k.
Compute the terms x_2 to x_100 using the recursive formula.
Calculate the term 1/(x_k + 1) for each k from 1 to 100.
Sum all the computed values from step 4.
Determine the integer part of the sum obtained in step 5.
